name: Kustom Weather Blueprint
description:
This is a template for creating and exporting svg weather icons into IcoMoon where you can generate an icofont for Kustom apps.


The template has two frames: Design and Export.

Export is a separate frame to which you copy the vectors from the Design frame and flatten them - IcoMoon doesn't like importing strokes, it's better to have all shapes have fills.

This is just so that you can keep a non-destructive backup in the Design frame.


The frames are named just like Kustom's wi(icon) formula, which makes writing any complicated formulas unnecessary, since wi(icon) is the formula that picks the correct icon.


Hope you find this useful and happy theming! :)

Any use case, no attribution necessary!
